name: Safari 4x4 Driving Simulator 2: Zombie Poacher Hunter
name_original: Safari 4x4 Driving Simulator 2: Zombie Poacher Hunter
description:
This is the sequel to Ranger in Training. The ultimate adventure race to capture the zombie poachers who have been trying to capture Rhinos and Elephants.

ZOMBIES
This games features those pesky zombie poachers. Find them and keep them from hurting those elephants and rhinos.

ELEPHANTS, RHINOS, LIONS
In the game, you will see your favorite safari animals walking around the African bush. Yes, I know, these are actually Asian elephants. Glad you took the time to notice.

JUMP OVER MOUNTAINS IN YOUR 4X4 VEHICLE
Wow, that was a big jump. I thought I would never come down after being up so high in the air with my 4x4.

THREE DIFFERENT 4X4 TRUCKS TO CHOOSE FROM
Choose from the traditional Dune Buggy, Defender, or Tank. Did you say TANK? Yes. you will drive a tank through the bush. Hey, these zombie poachers need to be stopped before they hurt another Rhino or Elephant.


This is a follow up game to the 4x4 Ranger in Training Game. There are tree main goals in this game.

DISABLE THE TRAPS
Animal traps are painful and inhumane. It is your duty to find them and destroy them by running them over with your vehicle.

HUNT DOWN THE POACHERS
Find those zombie poachers. They will come out of nowhere. Be careful, they can do damage to your vehicle.

FIND THE POACHER HIDEOUTS
Hit them where they live.

REALISTIC 3D GRAPHICS
Like you are actually driving through the African bush.

In reality, Rhino poaching is a serious problem in South Africa. I hope this game brings some awareness to the poaching problem. Support the effort made by those trying to protect these magnificent creatures.
